original_text: And the whole congregation sent some to speak to the children of Benjamin that were in the rock Rimmon, and to call peaceably unto them.
korean_text: 온 회중이 림몬 바위에 있는 베냐민 자손에게 사람을 보내어 평화를 공포하게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: And the whole congregation sent some
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 회중이 몇 사람을 보냈는데

sentences.original_text: to speak to the children of Benjamin
that were in the rock Rimmon
and to call peaceably unto them
